channel.title: Save money on Intercom, Mixpanel, etc?
channel.description:
At my company we occasionally have to trim back the number of users in Intercom/Mixpanel/etc so that our bill doesn't grow completely out of hand.
Does anyone else here find themselves doing that? I'm thinking about building an app to do this automatically and am trying to find out if others are experiencing that pain.
